data.title: Robin Haak on LinkedIn: I dont know who needs to hear this
data.meta_description:
I Don't Know Who Needs To Hear This But:

To all builders and visionaries: Sometimes, the journey gets rough. But remember, the real secret to breakingâ€¦
data.text: I Don't Know Who Needs To Hear This But: To all builders and visionaries: Sometimes, the journey gets rough. But remember, the real secret to breaking through? Grit and never-give-up spirit (determination!). Today's business world? It's challenging. Maybe it'll be for a while. But here's a thing: tough times create the toughest leaders and strongest companies. Those who push through now? They'll shine brightest in the years to come, outdoing businesses from easier times. Stay focused on your goal, be flexible and resilient, and keep pushing. Are you waiting for the right moment? This moment is when you start. Entrepreneurs, especially founders, are brave souls who step up, make a change, and keep going. Their path? Not easy. Most don't see the struggles they face. True leaders lead by doing, being in the thick of it, and taking risks. Happiness comes when you work hard for what you believe in (accountability and responsibility). Time and health are precious. Don't just follow the crowd. Value your time. If something bothers you now, deal with it. Change your story, stay strong. Don't give away your power by blaming others. Please be sure to stand firm in your journey and why. We tell our life stories, but sometimes we're stuck in the past. Remember, you're still writing your story. Let go of old ideas to make room for new ones. Be like water: adaptable, continually moving. Reality is how you see it. When faced with a problem, take a step back, think, and act. Not every fight is yours. When you do show, be thoughtful, and remember everyone's different. If you care about something, help it grow, but let it be true to itself. Changes? They'll always come. Embrace the right ones, and let go of the wrong ones. The only constant is change. Please be patient; the bigger picture takes time to see. Zoom out - at some point, you won't be able to see Earth anymore - the rate at which time passes depends on your frame of reference - its relative. Life's about moments: the joy, the passion, the love. Live in the now. Ground yourself, love deeply. Follow Brahmavihara: be kind, compassionate, joyful, and balanced. A strong mind needs a healthy body. Long success is about quality, not just time. When unsure, act. Move, reflect, eat well, rest, and stay stress-free. Success? It's about passion, routine, and discipline. You can stick to it, be true, and success will come. Lastly, be at peace with yourself. Know your worth. Once you do, help others. Everyone has strengths and weaknesses. The best gift? Trusting someone and watching them succeed.
